name: SENRAN KAGURA Reflexions - 30 Accessory Set
detailed_description:
30-Accessory Set for SENRAN KAGURA Reflexions.
This downloadable content contains the following 30 items:

・Accessories
Headdress, Regular Strand, Antennae Strand, Heart Strand, Nostalgic Strand, Ponytail Xt., Pigtails Xt. (R), Pigtails Xt. (L), Dbl. Buns Xt. (R), Dbl. Buns Xt. (L), Balloon, Otohime's Robe, Scrunchie, Bright Band (L), Bright Band (S), Glowstick (Red), Glowstick (Orange), Glowstick (Yellow), Glowstick (Green), Glowstick (Blue), Glowstick (Indigo), Glowstick (Violet), Worn Briefs, Worn Bloomers, Worn Boxers, Loose Socks (L), Loose Socks (R), Rainbow, Rain Cloud, Doll

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 @ 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
